name: wifi-automation
description: WiFi automation project with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: mutyabaronald
